verses.verse: Then He cried <S%H7121><s%> out in my hearing <S%H241><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Draw <S%H7126><s%> near, <S%H7126><s%> O executioners <S%H6486><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> each <S%H376><s%> with his destroying <S%H4892><s%> weapon <S%H3627><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>"

And behold, <S%H2009><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> men <S%H376><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from the direction <S%H1870><s%> of the upper <S%H5945><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> which <S%H834><s%> faces <S%H6437><s%> north, <S%H6828><s%> each <S%H376><s%> with his shattering <S%H4660><s%> weapon <S%H3627><s%> in his hand; <S%H3027><s%> and among <S%H8432><s%> them was a certain <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen <S%H906><s%> with a writing <S%H9373><s%> case <S%H7083><s%> at his loins. <S%H4975><s%> And they went <S%H935><s%> in and stood <S%H5975><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the bronze <S%H5178><s%> altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Then the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up from the cherub <S%H3742><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> it had been, <S%H1961><s%> to the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the temple. <S%H1004><s%> And He called <S%H7121><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen <S%H906><s%> at whose <S%H834><s%> loins <S%H4975><s%> was the writing <S%H9373><s%> case. <S%H7083><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Go <S%H5674><s%> through the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> [even] through the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and put <S%H8427><s%> a mark <S%H8420><s%> on the foreheads <S%H4696><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> who sigh <S%H584><s%> and groan <S%H602><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the abominations <S%H8441><s%> which are being committed <S%H6213><s%> in its midst. <S%H8432><s%>"

But to the others <S%H428><s%> He said <S%H559><s%> in my hearing, <S%H241><s%> "Go <S%H5674><s%> through the city <S%H5892><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him and strike; <S%H5221><s%> do not let your eye <S%H5869><s%> have <S%H2347><s%> pity, <S%H2347><s%> and do not spare. <S%H2550><s%>

"Utterly <S%H4889><s%> slay <S%H2026><s%> old <S%H2205><s%> men, <S%H2205><s%> young <S%H970><s%> men, <S%H970><s%> maidens, <S%H1330><s%> little <S%H2945><s%> children, <S%H2945><s%> and women, <S%H802><s%> but do not touch <S%H5066><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H376><s%> on whom <S%H834><s%> is the mark; <S%H8420><s%> and you shall start <S%H2490><s%> from My sanctuary. <S%H4720><s%>" So they started <S%H2490><s%> with the elders <S%H2205><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] before <S%H6440><s%> the temple. <S%H1004><s%>

And He said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Defile <S%H2930><s%> the temple <S%H1004><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> the courts <S%H2691><s%> with the slain. <S%H2491><s%> Go <S%H3318><s%> out!" Thus they went <S%H3318><s%> out and struck <S%H5221><s%> down <S%H5221><s%> [the people] in the city. <S%H5892><s%>

Then it came <S%H1961><s%> about as they were striking <S%H5221><s%> and I [alone] was left, <S%H7604><s%> that I fell <S%H5307><s%> on my face <S%H6440><s%> and cried <S%H2199><s%> out saying, <S%H559><s%> "Alas, <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> God! <S%H3068><s%> Art Thou destroying <S%H7843><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by pouring <S%H8210><s%> out Thy wrath <S%H2534><s%> on Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>?"

Then He said <S%H559><s%> to me, "The iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%> is very, <S%H3966><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> great, <S%H1419><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> is filled <S%H4390><s%> with blood, <S%H1818><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of perversion; <S%H4297><s%> for they say, <S%H559><s%> 'The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has forsaken <S%H5800><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> does not see! <S%H7200><s%>'

"But as for Me, My eye <S%H5869><s%> will have <S%H2347><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> pity <S%H2347><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> shall I spare, <S%H2550><s%> but I shall bring <S%H5414><s%> their conduct <S%H1870><s%> upon their heads. <S%H7218><s%>"

Then behold, <S%H2009><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen <S%H906><s%> at whose <S%H834><s%> loins <S%H4975><s%> was the writing <S%H7083><s%> case <S%H7083><s%> reported, <S%H7725><s%> <S%H1697><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "I have done <S%H6213><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as Thou hast commanded <S%H6680><s%> me."
